query: SELECT id, subjectId, version, JSON_EXTRACT(content, '$.framework.name') as framework_name, JSON_EXTRACT(content, '$.alignment_method.description') as alignment_desc FROM frameworks WHERE subjectId = (SELECT id FROM subjects WHERE code = 'economia_politica') LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2SqZsxfbXQHvi7k.root --database EnsVFtthx7GmB9n2DgDusz --execute SELECT id, subjectId, version, JSON_EXTRACT(content, '$.framework.name') as framework_name, JSON_EXTRACT(content, '$.alignment_method.description') as alignment_desc FROM frameworks WHERE subjectId = (SELECT id FROM subjects WHERE code = 'economia_politica') LIMIT 1;

rows.framework_name: "Framework Unico Valutazione Economia Politica - Programmi e Manuali"
rows.alignment_desc: "Allineamento = media ponderata dei criteri: score_i = max(0, 1 - |required_level_i - offered_score_i| / 4)"

stdout:
